feed.title: Homer Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Homer: v24.11.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Main changes

  • Update README.md by @alexfornuto in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/816
  • Add the option to set custom headers in the custom service client by @h3ku in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/649
  • Pass accept header when fetching the message via url by @RonaldJerez in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/605
  • feat: Add Gotify custom service component by @richid in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/706
  • Improve warning and missing reports for Radarr connections by @Bothari in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/809
  • Display round-trip time on the subtitle of the custom service ping by @sebersta in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/800
  • Fixes mealie when meal plan is empty by @rhardih in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/819
  • Fix immich widget after breaking changes update by @Canti23 in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/821

New Contributors

  • @alexfornuto made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/816
  • @h3ku made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/649
  • @RonaldJerez made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/605
  • @richid made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/706
  • @Bothari made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/809
  • @sebersta made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/800
  • @rhardih made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/819
  • @Canti23 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/821

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/compare/v24.10.2...v24.11.1

entry.title: New release for Homer: v24.11.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

Main changes

  • feat(smartcard): Simplify ping card, show round trip time by default when no subtitle provided.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/compare/v24.11.1...v24.11.2

entry.title: New release for Homer: v24.11.3
entry.content:

Main changes

  • Scrutiny custom service by @Canti23 in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/823

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/compare/v24.11.2...v24.11.3

entry.title: New release for Homer: v24.11.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

Main changes

  • added the missing leading slash.md by @DarkenLight in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/801
  • Tag use --highlight-secondary background if not set bulma classes by @Canti23 in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/824
  • Ping service timeout by @Canti23 in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/825

New Contributors

  • @DarkenLight made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/801

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/compare/v24.11.3...v24.11.4

entry.title: New release for Homer: v24.11.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

Main changes

  • Ping service now support custom success code definition by @bastienwirtz in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/commit/721a8c2e66c4e98c303826bd6ab344de5c1e3ba8.
  • PeaNUT custom service by @Canti23 in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/826
  • Fix param for demo showcase by @Canti23 in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/835
  • Add Gitea custom service by @meonkeys in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/833
  • Glances service improvements by @mq1 & @bastienwirtz in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/807 and https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/837

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/compare/v24.11.4...v24.11.5
